title: Teacher Professional Development for Inquiry-Based Science Education: Applying Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary education mathematics instruction experience, basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: An IBSE approach-enhanced mathematics course for general citizens. Modular learning structured using mobile devices in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply the 7 core components of IBSE to mathematical problem-solving.
Learners accurately analyze the inquiry activity scenarios designed through the mobile platform with over 80% accuracy.
Learners develop three or more instructional strategies utilizing the ProDevInq framework-based instructional design principles.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
